Has there been or is there planned or apparent any development near the crossing which may lead to a change or increase in use such as a housing estate or change in farming practice
Notes on new developments

Are there any adjacent sources of light/noise (e.g. Road, Industrial Site, Airport) that could affect the crossing users ability to see or hear an approaching train? (If yes note type and issue in Notes section.)
Are the signs for the crossing located? (If not directly on the route a crossing user would use, make note in Notes section.)

selections.name: I_SIGN_LOCATION
selections.displayValue: On the route a crossing user would take to cross the crossing directly

selections.name: I_SIGN_LOCATION
selections.displayValue: Not on the route a crossing user would take to cross the crossing directly

questions.text: Are the signs at the crossing positioned so as to be clearly visible for crossing users on a direct route over the crossing? (If no, note type of signs and any issue in Notes section.)
Are the signs for the crossing clearly visible during night/dusk? (If not visible make note in Notes section.)
Crossing approach notes
Notes on traffic utilisation
Is ice, mud, loose material or flood water a known problem at certain times
If yes, please describe
What is the road surface type?
Are there other known visibility problems at the crossing at certain times of the year (e.g. fog or foliage)
If yes, please describe
Has there been any user abuse of the crossing in the last year
Provide any additional information, such as history of abuse, effect of any mitigation measures that have been installed
